wikipedia_page.main: Henry Thomas (born 30 October 1991) is a rugby union player for Montpellier in the Top 14. He plays as a prop.

response: Henry Thomas (born 1971) is an American actor.
Henry Thomas may also refer to:
*Henry Thomas (blues musician) (1874–1930?), American country blues singer and musician
*Henry Thomas (athlete) (born 1967), former American high school sprinter
*Henry Thomas (American football) (born 1965), former defensive tackle in the National Football League
*Henry Thomas (MP), UK MP from the Irish constituency of Kinsale, 1835–1837 and 1838–1841
*Henry Thomas (miller) (1866–1928), owner of flour mill in South Australia
*Henry Thomas (rugby union) (born 1991), English rugby union player
*Henry T. Schnittkind (1888–1970), American author who wrote as Henry Thomas

response: On 31 January, Henry Slade was added to the squad as injury cover for Kyle Eastmond, while Henry Thomas has also been added to the squad as injury cover in the front row.Slade and Thomas called in for Wales training week Sam Burgess was also invited by head coach Stuart Lancaster to train with the senior squad, to continue his learning process in union.
On 1 February, Kieran Brookes replaced Henry Thomas, who had been covering Brookes in the initial squad, after recovering from a pre-squad announcement injury.Prop Kieran Brookes joins England squad
